since 1920s when it was first discovered

powerful negative electrode at the

along the sides of the craft those ions
collide with all the neutral air
molecules around it pushing them down at
the same time that stampede of ions
creates a vacuum on top of the ion a
craft so with the vacuum on top and a
strong push below you get a lift and the
craft silently floats into the air
there's a name for it it's called
